title: A New Beginning
description: The future is never decided â€”Evan Cross, D.E Year: 0015Did anyone ever tell you of the Dimension Rifts? Yes, portals to other dimensions that had had one day sprung up all over the entire world. Rumors said that happened on a day like any other and came without any warning.With the Dimension Rifts appearing all over the world, a new era had come, but though filled with endless possibilities, its lurking dangers would prove to be our end. That was the start of the apocalypse, the Dimension Apocalypse. Yet also, it was the start of one man's story.Evan Cross, a warrior from the destroyed future of Earth, struggles to fight against the inevitable fate of humankind. After failing to save the world in his previous life, he was granted a second chance. Can he defy the world's future? Find out now in this LitRPG System Tale of one man's quest, to prevent the end of all humanity.
author: Shadows Finger
